title: Trailblazer League/Areas/Asgarnia

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Asgarnia Area covers the entire Kingdom of Asgarnia along with the island of Entrana, the Pest Control islands, and Troll Country (excluding Weiss). Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

content:
The Asgarnia Area covers the entire Kingdom of Asgarnia along with the island of Entrana, the Pest Control islands, and Troll Country (excluding Weiss). Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

Access to Catherby from White Wolf Mountain will be restricted and prevented through the use of magical barriers.

Contents

  • 1 Overview of area
    • 1.1 Notable settlements
    • 1.2 Restricted travel
    • 1.3 Notable combat-related activities
    • 1.4 Notable non-combat activities
    • 1.5 Notable shops
    • 1.6 Slayer tasks added
  • 2 Unlocks
    • 2.1 Quests
    • 2.2 Achievement diary tasks
  • 3 Notable drops

Overview of area[edit | edit source]

Notable settlements[edit | edit source]

  • Burthorpe
  • Dwarven Mine
  • Entrana
  • Falador
  • Goblin Village
  • God Wars Dungeon
  • Port Sarim
  • Rimmington
  • Taverley
  • Troll Stronghold
  • Void Knights' Outpost

Restricted travel[edit | edit source]

The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:

  • The under-wall shortcut between Port Sarim and Draynor village
  • The rubble shortcut between Death Plateau and the Fremennik province
  • The cave between Trollweiss and Keldagrim
  • The rock-climb shortcut between the God Wars Dungeon and the Wilderness
  • The ladder between Taverley Dungeon and the water obelisk
  • The underground tunnel between Taverley and Catherby
  • The cave between Entrana and the Wilderness

Notable combat-related activities[edit | edit source]

  • Asgarnia Ice Dungeon
  • Cerberus
  • Giant Mole
  • God Wars Dungeon
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • Warriors' Guild

Notable non-combat activities[edit | edit source]

  • Crafting Guild
  • Falador Rooftop Agility Course
  • Falador tree patch
  • Falador allotment patch
  • Fire and water obelisks
  • Heroes' Guild
  • Motherlode Mine
  • Rimmington house portal
  • Rogues' Den
  • Air, body, law, and Mind Altars
  • Taverley house portal
  • Taverley tree patch
  • Troll Stronghold herb patch

Notable shops[edit | edit source]

  • Betty's Magic Emporium.
  • Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop.
  • Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop
  • Multicannon parts for sale

Slayer tasks added[edit | edit source]

Unlocking Asgarnia will add the following tasks to your slayer list:

  • Black dragons
  • Blue dragons
  • Hellhounds
  • Skeletal wyverns
  • Trolls
  • Spiritual Creatures

Unlocks[edit | edit source]

The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Merlin's Crystal
  • My Arm's Big Adventure
    • Eadgar's Ruse
      • Troll Stronghold
        • Death Plateau
    • The Feud

Achievement diary tasks[edit | edit source]

Automatically completed diary tasks upon area unlock
Falador Diary
Easy Tasks

None

Medium Tasks
  • Visit the Port Sarim Rat Pits
Hard Tasks
  • Recharge your Prayer in the Port Sarim church while wearing full Proselyte
Elite Tasks
  • Purchase a white 2h sword from Sir Vyvin

These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.

rawContent:
The '''Asgarnia Area''' covers the entire [[Asgarnia|Kingdom of Asgarnia]] along with the island of [[Entrana]], the [[Void Knights' Outpost|Pest Control islands]], and [[Troll Country]] (excluding [[Weiss]]). Underground areas and [[instance|instanced areas]] with an entrance in the area are also included. 

Access to [[Catherby]] from [[White Wolf Mountain]] will be restricted and prevented through the use of magical barriers.

==Overview of area==
===Notable settlements===
* [[Burthorpe]]
* [[Dwarven Mine]]
* [[Entrana]]
* [[Falador]]
* [[Goblin Village]]
* [[God Wars Dungeon]]
* [[Port Sarim]]
* [[Rimmington]]
* [[Taverley]]
* [[Troll Stronghold (location)|Troll Stronghold]]
* [[Void Knights' Outpost]]

===Restricted travel===
The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:
* The under-wall shortcut between Port Sarim and [[Draynor village]]
* The rubble shortcut between [[Death Plateau (location)|Death Plateau]] and the [[Fremennik]] province
* The cave between [[Trollweiss Mountain|Trollweiss]] and [[Keldagrim]]
* The rock-climb shortcut between the God Wars Dungeon and the [[Wilderness]]
* The ladder between [[Taverley Dungeon]] and the [[water obelisk]]
* The underground tunnel between Taverley and Catherby
* The cave between Entrana and the Wilderness

===Notable combat-related activities===
* [[Asgarnia Ice Dungeon]]
* [[Cerberus]]
* [[Giant Mole]]
* [[God Wars Dungeon]]
* [[Taverley Dungeon]]
* [[Warriors' Guild]]

===Notable non-combat activities===
* [[Crafting Guild]]
* [[Falador Rooftop Course|Falador Rooftop Agility Course]]
* Falador tree patch
* Falador allotment patch
* [[Fire obelisk|Fire]] and water obelisks
* [[Heroes' Guild]]
* [[Motherlode Mine]]
* [[Rimmington]] house portal
* [[Rogues' Den]]
* [[air alter|Air]], [[body alter|body]], [[law alter|law]], and [[Mind Altar]]s
* Taverley house portal
* Taverley tree patch
* Troll Stronghold herb patch

===Notable shops===
* [[Betty's Magic Emporium.]]
* [[Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop.]]
* [[Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop]]
* [[Multicannon parts for sale]]

===Slayer tasks added===
Unlocking Asgarnia will add the following tasks to your slayer list:
* [[Black dragons]]
* [[Blue dragons]]
* [[Hellhounds]]
* [[Skeletal Wyvern|Skeletal wyverns]]
* [[Trolls]]
*[[Spiritual creature|Spiritual Creatures]]

==Unlocks==
The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.
===Quests===
*[[Merlin's Crystal]]
*[[My Arm's Big Adventure]]
**[[Eadgar's Ruse]]
***[[Troll Stronghold]]
****[[Death Plateau]]
**[[The Feud]]

===Achievement diary tasks===
